about_the_game:
Brick Breaker: Eliminate Mosaic and Reveal Beauty is a fresh take on the classic brick-breaking arcade game, blending engaging gameplay with a visually rewarding experience. Every brick is a piece of a digital mosaic obscuring a stunning hidden image. Break the bricks to gradually unveil breathtaking pictures across various themed Series. This is my first game, developed with the help of ChatGPT, making it a special project that combines creativity, technology, and interactive fun.

Themed Series

Explore a wide range of beautifully curated themes, each featuring mesmerizing images hidden behind the mosaic:

  • Solar System – Reveal the wonders of planets in solar system.

  • Cosmos Images by JWST – Discover breathtaking deep-space photos captured by the James Webb Space Telescope.

  • Flowers – Break bricks to reveal vibrant blossoms and botanical beauty.

  • Landscape Scenery – Unveil breathtaking natural and urban landscapes.

  • Fireworks – Smash bricks to reveal dazzling bursts of color and light.

  • Pets – Discover adorable cats, dogs, and other furry companions.

  • Birds – Reveal the elegance of colorful and exotic bird species.

  • Aquatic Animals – Uncover marine life, from playful dolphins to mysterious deep-sea creatures.

  • Forest Animals – Find hidden creatures of the woodlands, from foxes to deer.

  • Grassland/Desert Animals – Encounter wildlife from the vast plains and arid deserts.

  • AI-Generated Portraits – Explore stunning AI-generated charming and adorable portraits in different styles (anime, painting or realistic style)

Key Features

  • Classic Arcade Gameplay with a Unique Twist – Experience familiar brick-breaking mechanics while revealing stunning hidden images.

  • Diverse Themed Series – Play through multiple pre-designed themes with captivating visuals.

  • Custom Level Editor – Import your own images, background music, and sound effects to create personalized levels and share them with friends.

  • Dynamic Power-Ups – Collect different power-ups to enhance gameplay and strategy.

  • Adjustable Difficulty – Play at your own pace with customizable challenge levels.

  • Beautiful Visuals & Soothing Soundtrack – Immerse yourself in an aesthetically pleasing and relaxing game.

Game Controls

Menu Navigation

  • [Up] / [Down] / Mouse Move – Select

  • [Mouse Wheel] – Scroll

  • [Enter] / [Space] / [Left Mouse Button (LMB)] – Confirm

  • [ESC] / [Backspace] / [Right Mouse Button (RMB)] – Back

  • Numpad [8] / [2] / [Enter] also work

Brick Breaker Gameplay

  • [Left] / [Right] / Mouse Move – Move paddle

  • [Space] / [Enter] / [Left Mouse Button (LMB)] – Launch ball

  • [ESC] / [Backspace] – Pause

  • [+] – Speed up (more score)

  • [-] – Slow down (less score)

  • Numpad [4] / [6] / [Enter] / [+] / [-] also work

Power-Ups Effects

  • Red – Explosive ball

  • Green – Piercing ball

  • Blue – Speed-up ball (more score)

  • Yellow – Slow-down ball (less score)

  • Outward Arrow – Expand paddle

  • Inward Arrow – Shrink paddle

  • “+” – Extra life

  • “-” – Lose one life

Technical Notes

This game was developed using pygame (Python 3), which may take longer to start, especially on the first launch. Your patience is appreciated! Some antivirus software may block pygame files, potentially preventing the game from running, especially on MacOS.

Acknowledgment

The development of this game was greatly supported by AI tools such as ChatGPT for coding, image recognition, and drafting the store description. Most images were sourced from Pexels, while background music and sound effects were primarily provided by FiftySounds. Additionally, AI-generated portraits (originally published and downloaded from Bilibili) are used as background images in the AI Portraits series. We sincerely appreciate the valuable contributions of these platforms and tools.

If you love classic brick-breaking games with a creative touch, Brick Breaker: Eliminate Mosaic and Reveal Beauty is the perfect game to unwind and enjoy a visually rewarding experience.

content_descriptors.notes: Some portraits in the game may contain mildly suggestive or sexually arousing content.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 12
  • Processor: Apple M* core or Intel core
  • Memory: 100 MB RAM
  • Graphics: any graphics
  • Sound Card: any sound card
  • Additional Notes: developed by pygame (python3)

short_description: Break bricks, eliminate the mosaic, and uncover breathtaking images! This is a visually rewarding twist on the classic brick-breaking game featuring themed Series from space wonders to wildlife. Customize your own levels with personal images, music, and sound effects!
